text: There was a crooked man he walked a crooked mile.
He found a crooked sixpence upon a crooked stile.
He bought a crooked cat, which caught a crooked mouse,
And they all lived together in a crooked house.
There was a crooked man he walked a crooked mile.
He found a crooked sixpence upon a crooked stile.
He bought a crooked cat, which caught a crooked mouse,
And they all lived together in a crooked house.
They ate crooked dinner on a crooked table
And came a crooked horse from a crooked stable
They all had crooked dishes in many crooked style
And after every bite each had a crooked smile
